content: Hello! How can I assist you today?
Thank you! I'm here to help with any questions or tasks you have. Just let me know how I can assist you.
how do i create a new angualr ocmponent in a command

To create a new Angular component using the Angular CLI, you can use the following command:

```bash
ng generate component component-name
```

Replace `component-name` with the name you want to give to the new component. This command will create a new folder with the component files in the `src/app` directory, along with the necessary updates to the app module.

For example, if you want to create a new component named `my-component`, you can run the following command:

```bash
ng generate component my-component
```

This will create a folder named `my-component` with the component files inside, as well as update the app module to include the new component.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.
